snippet: The resolution, passed unanimously, established a panel to identify the perpetrators of chlorine bombings and other chemical attacks in the Syria war.
abstract: United Nations Security Council unanimously adopts resolution to create panel to identify perpetrators of chlorine bombings and other chemical attacks in the Syria war.
lead_paragraph: The resolution, passed unanimously, established a panel to identify the perpetrators of chlorine bombings and other chemical attacks in the Syria war.

headline.main: U.N. Security Council Adopts Measure to Identify Chlorine Bomb Users in Syria
headline.print_headline: U.N. Seeks Out Chlorine Bomb Users in Syria

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
